summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx dated June 8, 2001, detailing shipping charges for services rendered to Jeffrey Epstein. The invoice includes billing and shipping addresses, payment details, and a summary of charges.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is listed as the account holder for the FedEx services detailed in the invoice.

persons.name: Bella Tsukeman
persons.context: Bella Tsukeman is mentioned as the billing contact associated with the account.

persons.name: Eric Gany
persons.context: Eric Gany is noted as the sender of the package that was shipped via FedEx.

connections.description: Bella Tsukeman is the billing contact for the FedEx account held by Jeffrey Epstein.
Eric Gany is identified as the sender of a package associated with Jeffrey Epstein's FedEx account.

events.title: Package Pickup
events.description: A package was picked up by FedEx for delivery on this date.

events.title: Package Delivery
events.description: The package sent by Eric Gany was delivered on this date.

keyFacts: The invoice is dated June 8, 2001, and pertains to shipping services provided by FedEx.
Jeffrey Epstein is listed as the account holder for the FedEx services.
Bella Tsukeman is identified as the billing contact for the account.
Eric Gany is noted as the sender of a package shipped via FedEx.
The total charges for the services rendered amount to $11.90.
